verses.verse: וַיְהִ֧י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- Moreover the word יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> yir-me-Ya-hu came unto Jeremiah שֵׁנִ֑ית <WH8145> she-Nit; the second וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> ve-Hu he עוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <WH5750> o-Den-nu was still עָצ֔וּר <WH6113> 'a-Tzur, time while he was yet shut up בַּחֲצַ֥ר <WH2691> ba-cha-Tzar in the court הַמַּטָּרָ֖ה <WH4307> ham-mat-ta-Rah of the prison לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֥ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD עֹשָׂ֑הּ <WH6213> 'o-Sah; the maker יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh thereof the LORD יוֹצֵ֥ר <WH3335> yo-Tzer that formed אוֹתָ֛הּ <WH853> o-Tah לַהֲכִינָ֖הּ <WH3559> la-ha-chi-Nah it to establish יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh it the LORD שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> she-Mo. [is] his name

קְרָ֥א <WH7121> ke-Ra Call אֵלַ֖י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me וְאֶעֱנֶ֑ךָּ <WH6030> ve-'e-'e-Ne-ka; unto me and I will answer וְאַגִּ֧ידָה <WH5046> ve-'ag-Gi-dah thee and shew לְּךָ֛ le-Cha גְּדֹל֥וֹת <WH1419> ge-do-Lot thee great וּבְצֻר֖וֹת <WH1219> u-ve-tzu-Rot and mighty things לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not יְדַעְתָּֽם׃ <WH3045> ye-da'-Tam. which thou knowest ס sa-Mek

כִּי֩ <WH3588> ki For כֹ֨ה <WH3541> choh thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> 'a-Mar For thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- concerning בָּתֵּי֙ <WH1004> bat-Tei concerning the houses הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir of this city הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> haz-Zot, likewise וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and concerning בָּתֵּ֖י <WH1004> bat-Tei and concerning the houses מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> mal-Chei of the kings יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah הַנְּתֻצִ֕ים <WH5422> han-ne-tu-Tzim which are thrown down אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- against הַסֹּלְל֖וֹת <WH5550> has-so-le-Lot by the mounts וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and against הֶחָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> he-Cha-rev. and by the sword

בָּאִ֗ים <WH935> ba-'Im, They come לְהִלָּחֵם֙ <WH3898> le-hil-la-Chem to fight אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with הַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <WH3778> hak-kas-Dim, with the Chaldeans וּלְמַלְאָם֙ <WH4390> u-le-mal-'Am but [it is] to fill אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with פִּגְרֵ֣י <WH6297> pig-Rei them with the dead bodies הָאָדָ֔ם <WH120> ha-'a-Dam, of men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- whom הִכֵּ֥יתִי <WH5221> hik-Kei-ti whom I have slain בְאַפִּ֖י <WH639> ve-'ap-Pi in mine anger וּבַחֲמָתִ֑י <WH2534> u-va-cha-ma-Ti; and in my fury וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> va-'a-Sher whom הִסְתַּ֤רְתִּי <WH5641> his-Tar-ti I have hid פָנַי֙ <WH6440> fa-Nai my face מֵהָעִ֣יר <WH5892> me-ha-'Ir from this city הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> haz-Zot, likewise עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al because כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of all רָעָתָֽם׃ <WH7451> ra-'a-Tam. and for all whose wickedness

הִנְנִ֧י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold מַעֲלֶה־ <WH5927> ma-'a-leh- Behold I will bring לָּ֛הּ lah אֲרֻכָ֥ה <WH724> 'a-ru-Chah it health וּמַרְפֵּ֖א <WH4832> u-mar-Pe and cure וּרְפָאתִ֑ים <WH7495> u-re-fa-Tim; and I will cure וְגִלֵּיתִ֣י <WH1540> ve-gil-lei-Ti them and will reveal לָהֶ֔ם <WH1992> la-Hem, to them עֲתֶ֥רֶת <WH6283> 'a-Te-ret unto them the abundance שָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> sha-Lom of peace וֶאֱמֶֽת׃ <WH571> ve-'e-Met. and truth

וַהֲשִֽׁבֹתִי֙ <WH7725> va-ha-shi-vo-Ti to return אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁב֣וּת <WH7622> she-Vut And I will cause the captivity יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et שְׁב֣וּת <WH7622> she-Vut and the captivity יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וּבְנִתִ֖ים <WH1129> u-ve-ni-Tim and will build כְּבָרִֽאשֹׁנָֽה׃ <WH7223> ke-va-Ri-sho-Nah. them as at the first

וְטִ֣הַרְתִּ֔ים <WH2891> ve-Ti-har-Tim, And I will cleanse מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol all עֲוֹנָ֖ם <WH5771> 'a-vo-Nam them from all their iniquity אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which חָֽטְאוּ־ <WH2398> cha-te-'u- whereby they have sinned לִ֑י Li; וְסָלַחְתִּ֗י <WH5545> ve-sa-lach-Ti, against me and I will pardon; לְכֹול־ le-chol- כלְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol all עֲוֹנֽוֹתֵיהֶם֙ <WH3605> a-vo-no-tei-Hem all קאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which חָֽטְאוּ־ <WH2398> cha-te-'u- whereby they have sinned לִ֔י Li, וַאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> va-'a-Sher which פָּ֥שְׁעוּ <WH6586> Pa-she-'u and whereby they have transgressed בִֽי׃ Vi.

וְהָ֣יְתָה <WH1961> ve-Ha-ye-tah become לִּ֗י Li, לְשֵׁ֤ם <WH8034> le-Shem And it shall be to me a name שָׂשׂוֹן֙ <WH8342> sa-sOn of joy לִתְהִלָּ֣ה <WH8416> lit-hil-Lah a praise וּלְתִפְאֶ֔רֶת <WH8597> u-le-tif-'E-ret, and an honour לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> le-Chol all גּוֹיֵ֣י <WH1471> go-Yei before all the nations הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; of the earth אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יִשְׁמְע֜וּ <WH8085> yish-me-'U which shall hear אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of all הַטּוֹבָ֗ה <WH2896> hat-to-Vah, all the good אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I עֹשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> 'o-Seh that I do אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> 'o-Tam, וּפָחֲד֣וּ <WH6342> u-fa-cha-Du unto them and they shall fear וְרָֽגְז֗וּ <WH7264> ve-ra-ge-Zu, and tremble עַ֤ל <WH5921> 'al because כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of all הַטּוֹבָה֙ <WH2896> hat-to-Vah for all the goodness וְעַ֣ל <WH5921> ve-'Al because כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all הַשָּׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> hash-sha-Lom, and for all the prosperity אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אָֽנֹכִ֖י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I עֹ֥שֶׂה <WH6213> 'O-seh that I procure לָּֽהּ׃ <WH99999> Lah. ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֣ה׀ <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD עוֹד֮ <WH5750> 'Od Yet יִשָּׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> yish-sha-Ma' Again there shall be heard בַּמָּקוֹם־ <WH4725> bam-ma-kom- in this place הַזֶּה֒ <WH2088> haz-Zeh this אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher of which אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> 'at-Tem you אֹֽמְרִ֔ים <WH559> 'o-me-Rim, which ye say חָרֵ֣ב <WH2720> cha-Rev [shall be] desolate ה֔וּא <WH1931> Hu, he מֵאֵ֥ין <WH369> me-'Ein without אָדָ֖ם <WH120> 'a-Dam without man וּמֵאֵ֣ין <WH369> u-me-'Ein and without בְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> be-he-Mah; and without beast בְּעָרֵ֤י <WH5892> be-'a-Rei [even] in the cities יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah וּבְחֻצ֣וֹת <WH2351> u-ve-chu-Tzot and in the streets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem הַֽנְשַׁמּ֗וֹת <WH8074> han-sham-Mot, that are desolate מֵאֵ֥ין <WH369> me-'Ein without אָדָ֛ם <WH120> 'a-Dam without man וּמֵאֵ֥ין <WH369> u-me-'Ein and without יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> yo-Shev and without inhabitant וּמֵאֵ֥ין <WH369> u-me-'Ein and without בְּהֵמָֽה׃ <WH929> be-he-Mah. and without beast

ק֣וֹל <WH6963> Kol The voice שָׂשׂ֞וֹן <WH8342> sa-Son of joy וְק֣וֹל <WH6963> ve-Kol and the voice שִׂמְחָ֗ה <WH8057> sim-Chah, of gladness ק֣וֹל <WH6963> Kol the voice חָתָן֮ <WH2860> cha-Tan of the bridegroom וְק֣וֹל <WH6963> ve-Kol and the voice כַּלָּה֒ <WH3618> kal-Lah of the bride ק֣וֹל <WH6963> Kol the voice אֹמְרִ֡ים <WH559> 'o-me-Rim of them that shall say הוֹדוּ֩ <WH3034> ho-Du Praise אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot of hosts כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for ט֤וֹב <WH2896> Tov [is] good יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh for the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּ֔וֹ <WH2617> chas-Do, for his mercy מְבִאִ֥ים <WH935> me-vi-'Im [and] of them that shall bring תּוֹדָ֖ה <WH8426> to-Dah the sacrifice of praise בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit into the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אָשִׁ֧יב <WH7725> 'a-Shiv For I will cause to return אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁבוּת־ <WH7622> she-vut- the captivity הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz of the land כְּבָרִאשֹׁנָ֖ה <WH7223> ke-va-ri-sho-Nah as at the first אָמַ֥ר <WH559> 'a-Mar saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD ס sa-Mek

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָאוֹת֒ <WH6635> tze-va-'Ot of hosts ע֞וֹד <WH5750> od will again יִֽהְיֶ֣ה׀ <WH1961> yih-Yeh become בַּמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> bam-ma-Kom Again in this place הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, this הֶחָרֵ֛ב <WH2720> he-cha-Rev which is desolate מֵֽאֵין־ <WH369> me-'ein- else אָדָ֥ם <WH120> 'a-Dam without man וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- or בְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> be-he-Mah and without beast וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> u-ve-Chol all עָרָ֑יו <WH5892> 'a-Rav; and in all the cities נְוֵ֣ה <WH5116> ne-Veh thereof shall be an habitation רֹעִ֔ים <WH7462> ro-'Im, of shepherds מַרְבִּצִ֖ים <WH7257> mar-bi-Tzim to lie down צֹֽאן׃ <WH6629> Tzon. causing [their] flocks

בְּעָרֵ֨י <WH5892> be-'a-Rei In the cities הָהָ֜ר <WH2022> ha-Har of the mountains בְּעָרֵ֤י <WH5892> be-'a-Rei in the cities הַשְּׁפֵלָה֙ <WH8219> hash-she-fe-Lah of the vale וּבְעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> u-ve-'a-Rei and in the cities הַנֶּ֔גֶב <WH5045> han-Ne-gev, of the south וּבְאֶ֧רֶץ <WH776> u-ve-'E-retz and in the land בִּנְיָמִ֛ן <WH1144> bin-ya-Min of Benjamin וּבִסְבִיבֵ֥י <WH5439> u-vis-vi-Vei and in the places about יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim Jerusalem וּבְעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> u-ve-'a-Rei and in the cities יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah עֹ֣ד <WH5750> 'od will again תַּעֲבֹ֧רְנָה <WH5674> ta-'a-Vo-re-nah pass again הַצֹּ֛אן <WH6629> hatz-Tzon shall the flocks עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- under יְדֵ֥י <WH3027> ye-Dei under the hands מוֹנֶ֖ה <WH4487> mo-Neh of him that telleth אָמַ֥ר <WH559> 'a-Mar [them] saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD ס sa-Mek

הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> ya-Mim Behold the days בָּאִ֖ים <WH935> ba-'Im come נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD וַהֲקִֽמֹתִי֙ <WH6965> va-ha-ki-mo-Ti that I will perform אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> had-da-Var thing הַטּ֔וֹב <WH2896> hat-Tov, that good אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which דִּבַּ֛רְתִּי <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti which I have promised אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- concerning בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit and to the house יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah

בַּיָּמִ֤ים <WH3117> bai-ya-Mim In those days הָהֵם֙ <WH1992> ha-Hem those וּבָעֵ֣ת <WH6256> u-va-'Et and at that time הַהִ֔יא <WH1931> ha-Hi, he אַצְמִ֥יחַ <WH6779> 'atz-Mi-ach to grow up לְדָוִ֖ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid unto David צֶ֣מַח <WH6780> Tze-mach will I cause the Branch צְדָקָ֑ה <WH6666> tze-da-Kah; of righteousness וְעָשָׂ֛ה <WH6213> ve-'a-Sah and he shall execute מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> mish-Pat judgment וּצְדָקָ֖ה <WH6666> u-tze-da-Kah and righteousness בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ba-'A-retz. in the land

בַּיָּמִ֤ים <WH3117> bai-ya-Mim In those days הָהֵם֙ <WH1992> ha-Hem those תִּוָּשַׁ֣ע <WH3467> tiv-va-Sha' be saved יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, shall Judah וִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> vi-ru-sha-Lim and Jerusalem תִּשְׁכּ֣וֹן <WH7931> tish-Kon shall dwell לָבֶ֑טַח <WH983> la-Ve-tach; safely וְזֶ֥ה <WH2088> ve-Zeh and this אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which יִקְרָא־ <WH7121> yik-ra- and this [is the name] wherewith she shall be called לָ֖הּ lah יְהוָ֥ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD צִדְקֵֽנוּ׃ <WH6664> tzid-Ke-nu. prosperity ס sa-Mek

כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- For כֹ֖ה <WH3541> choh thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar For thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- shall never יִכָּרֵ֣ת <WH3772> yik-ka-Ret want לְדָוִ֔ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid, David אִ֕ישׁ <WH376> 'ish a man יֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> yo-Shev to sit עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on כִּסֵּ֥א <WH3678> kis-Se upon the throne בֵֽית־ <WH1004> veit- of the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel
